tgt_original: abhāvetyādi-  gāthām uccārya  sthāva || ||  rādipadārthān  śūnyatāyāṃ praveśayet |
traidhātuka ekas satvo [ ' ] pi  nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati |  bhājanalokamātram avatiṣṭhate |  tadā kramakrameṇa (2)  saptasūryāṇāṃ raśmayaḥ  prādurbhūya
traidhātukaṃ dagdhvā  ākāśamayaṃ kurvvanti ||  imam artham utpattikramabhāvakaḥ |  abhāveti  gāthām  uc [ c ] āryālambayati |
punaḥ pratītyasamutpāda-  prabandhabalān  mandamandā vāyavaḥ syandante |  tatas te vāyavo varddhamānā
pariṇāhenāsaṃkhyam vāyumaṇḍalam  tasmin vāyumaṇḍale  meghā sambhūyākṣamātrābhir  dhārābhir varṣayanti |
tasya pramāṇaṃ (3)  yojanānām ekādaśalakṣam  udvedho viṃśatiś ca sahasrāṇi |
tāś ca punar āpo vāyubhir  mahī bhavaty apām upariṣṭhāt |
tasyāḥ pramāṇaṃ trayo lakṣā  udvedhās sahasrāṇi ca viṃśatiḥ
samastadevatācakraṃ vinyased  yogānuyogā-  tiyoga-  mahāyogāḥ krameṇa
japan bhāvanāṃ ca kṛtvā  nyāśa ( sic )  deśanā śūcitā ( sic ) syāt ||  idānīm

src_original: དེར་སྐྱེ་གནས་བཞི་པོ་འདི་ལྟ་སྟེ་། སྒོ་ང་ལས་སྐྱེས་པ་དང་། མངལ་ལས་སྐྱེས་པ་དང་། དྲོད་གཤེར་ལས་སྐྱེས་པ་དང་། རྫུས་ཏེ་སྐྱེས་པའོ་༎ སྐྱེ་གནས་ནི་སྐྱེ་པའོ་༎

tgt_original: ayaṃ sanniveśotpādo  yoginām  ākāśadhātumadhyasthaṃ  bhāvayed vāyumaṇḍalam  ity ādinā

src_original: གླང་པོ་དང་། རྟ་དང་། བ་ལང་དང་། མ་ཧེ་དང་། བོང་བུ་དང་། ཕག་དང་། མི་ལ་སོགས་པའོ་༎

tgt_original: evaṃ satvānāṃ  karmaprabhāvasambhūtair  vāyubhis saṃhṛtya  suvarṇṇādayo rāśī  kriyante |  sumervādayaḥ parvatā (4)  devavimānāni
tato vijñānādhipatir  mahāvajradharaḥ  satvajanakaḥ |  bhājanalokān niṣpādya  satvalokaṃ  nirmiṇoti |
ye satvā  avikalā  ahīnendriyāḥ  sarvāgapratyaṅgopetāḥ  sakṛd upajāyante |
tena sukṛtaduḥkṛtānāṃ  satvānāṃ karmaphala-  vipāko'tra dṛśyate |
tathāpy atra jambudvīpe manuṣyāḥ  śaṭha kapaṭamada-  mātsaryaduṣṭāśayā  jarāvyādhiparipīḍitāḥ |
tena bodhisatvā (8)  jambudvīpe [ ]  janapadeṣūpapadya  dharman deśayanti |
niṣkrāntalābho dvitīyan nidhānaṃ |  pravrajyalābhas tṛtīyaṃ nidhānaṃ |
iti |  asādhāraṇaguhya-  mahāyogatantre [ ' ] py āha |  atītānāgatapratyutpanna  [ sarva ] buddhā manuṣyātmabhāve  sthitvā  sarvajñasiddhipadaṃ
prativasanti kim arthaṃ  caramabhavikā  bodhisatvā mahāsatvās  tuṣitavarabhuvanāt  tatra nāvataranti |  avaśyam evātra jambudvīpe  avatīrya manuṣyāṇāṃ  dharman deśayanti |
kāraṇam atra nirdeśatu  bhagavān vajraguruḥ śāstā | (7)
evaṃ svacittavakraḥ  kalyāṇamitravirahitaḥ |  svasvabhāvaṃ na jñātvā  satvanikāyāc cyutvā cyutvā (10)
yāvad āyanti sāmagrīn na labhate  tāvat saptāhan  antarābhave tiṣṭhatīti  niścayam āha |
āha maraṇabhavasya |  utpattibhavasya cāntare  ya ātmabhāvo [ ' ] bhinirvarttate |  deśāntaropapattisaṃprāptaye so  sa tu paṭvindriyo bhavati |
yathā caramabhaviko  bodhisatvaḥ saṃpūrṇṇayauvanaḥ  sarva [ jña ] lakṣaṇānuvyañjanaś ca  tathaivāntarābhavastho'pi  mātuḥ kukṣau praviśet |
prāthamikakalpikā manuṣyās  sarvabuddhaguṇālaṃkṛta  rūpiṇo manomayāḥ | (9)  sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā
prītyāhārā jñānamūrttayas  te māyopamasamādhiṃ  na prajānanti |  aprajānanto'nādikālān  ajñānavāsanāprabandhabalāt  krameṇa svacittodbhūtaiḥ  karmakleśair  abhibhūyante
prāthamakalpikānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ |  kavaḍīkārāhāra paryante  kharatvaṃ gurutvaṃ kāye [ ' ] vakrāntaṃ |  prabhā'ntarhitā |
tato'ndhakāre ( sic ) utpanne  sūryācandramasau loke  prādurbhūtau | (13)
tata [ ḥ ] prajñopāyavibhāga-  darśanārthaṃ teṣāṃ  strīpuruṣendriye prādurbhūte  saṃsthānaṃ ca bhinnan teṣām
anyonyaṃ paśyatāṃ pūrvābhyāsavaśād  anyonyarāgacittam utpannaṃ |  yato vipratipannāḥ | tad
ārabhya strīpuruṣa iti saṃjñāntaram  adyāpi loke pravarttate |
tatas sa [? ]  trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ  saṃmukhībhāvān mātuḥ kukṣau [ sa ]  garbbhasyāvakrānto bhavati |
mātā kalyā bhavati ṛtumatī |  mātāpitarau raktau bhavataḥ |
tatas tayor anyonyam anurāgaṇa-  vajrādhiṣṭhānenāliṅgana-  cumbanādikriyayā dvayendriya-  samāpattiṃ dṛṣṭvā [ kā ] (14)  kāmopadānāyā ntarābhavaṃ hitvā
yathā caramabhaviko  bodhisatvo mahāsatvas  saṃbhogakāyena manuṣyāṇām  arthaḥ kartun na śakyata iti kṛtvā  skandhadhātvāyatanā-  nupraveśena  garbbhāvakrāntim upadarśayati |
tathā'ntarābhavastho'pi  svavikalpavāsanāprabandho-  dbhūtakarmaṇā saṃcodite saty  utpattiṃ gṛhṇāty anena krameṇa |
sphoṭakākāraḥ prajāyante |  tataḥ keśaromanakhādaya  indriyāṇi rūpāṇi  vyañjanāny anupūrvaśa iti |
sa ca paṃcatathāgatādhiṣṭhānād  bījāvasthām  ārabhya paṃcākāropajāyate [ | ] (16)
garbbhaśalyasyābhyantare  mātuḥ kukṣau karmavipākajā  vāyavo vānti |  ye ga [ gha ] rbbhaśalyaṃ  saṃparivarttya mātuś ca kukṣau  dharmodayadvārābhimukho  'vasthāpayanti |
sacet punsān bhavati  mātur dakṣiṇakukṣim āśritya  pṛṣṭhābhimukhaḥ |
utkuṭukas saṃbhavati |  atha strī tato vāmaṃ kukṣim  āśritya udarābhimukhībhavati |
tato daśānāṃ māsānām ante  mūlasūtrokta-  samayodbhavavajrasamādhipradarśanāya  mātur ggarbbhāt  pracyuto'bhūd iti |
atas sa [ rva ] gandharvasatvo (18)  māṃsacakṣuṣā dṛśyatāṅgataḥ |
bha [ va ] gavān bodhicittavajras  tathāgatas trimukhākāreṇa  sarvatathāgatais  saṃdṛśyate smeti |
abdhātuḥ paitṛko jñeyas  tejodhātuś ca mātṛkaḥ |
ity uktaṃ bhagavatā caturdevī  paripṛcchāmahāyogatantre |  iyatā granthena caturyoganiṣpanno (19)
dvau nāḍī yonimadhye tu  vāmadakṣiṇayos tathā |  vāme śukram vijānīyād
utpādayitavyam iti ||  [ dvitīyanyāśa ( sic )  deśanā paricchedaḥ || ]  [ tathotpattikramavyavasthā
dveṣo mohas tathā rāgaś  cintāmaṇisamayās tathā |
kulā hy ete tu vai paṃca
idānīṃ  vyavastholitṛtīyopadeśam āha |  prathamaṃ tāvat  kāyamaṇḍalaṃ vyavasthāpyate |
dveṣaratir māmakī  abdhātuḥ |  rāgaratiḥ pāṇḍaravāsinī  tejodhātuḥ |
bodhicittaṃ ca maṇḍalaṃ |  deho maṇḍalam ity uktam
bhagavān mañjuśrīḥ  ṣaṭpravṛttivijñāne  sthitvā jñānatrayaṃ nirūpya  paracittajñānābhijñāṃ  pradadāti [ | ]
bhagavān  sarvanivaraṇaviṣkambhī  kāyendriye sthitvā  nīvaraṇaṃ antarddhātūn  parasparaṃ piṇḍīkṛtya  jātiṃ praveśya vajrakāyam  āpādayati |
bhagavān samantabhadras  samantatas sandhisthāne sthitvā  prabhāśvaraṃ ( sic ) sandhiṃ  pradadāti [ ?? ] |
bhagavām maitreyaḥ  snāyusvabhāvena sthitvā  snāyubhir baddhvā (24)  prabhāśva ( sic )  raṃ praveśayati |  se eva bhagavān
rūpatrayākāreṇa  bāhyavad avabhāsya  cakṣurindriyasukha-  pradānād rūpavajrā |
sarvayogo hi bhagavān  vajrasattvas tathāgataḥ |  tasyopabhogaṃ samastaṃ vai
devatīvinyāśā ( sic ) d dhātavo  buddhatvadāyakā bhavanti |
sa eva bhagavān cittavajraḥ |  kṣitigarbbhasamādhinā  cakṣurindriye  sthitvā rūpatrayaṃ  prabhāsvaratvena  nirūpya  vajracakṣurindriyaṃ pradadāti |
evaṃ vajrapāṇiḥ  śrotrendriye sthitvā  śabdatrayaṃ tathaiva nirūpya  vajraśrotrendriyaṃ  pradadāti |
ākāśagarbbho (23)  ghrāṇendriye sthitvā  trigandhaṃ nirūpya  vajraghrāṇendriyaṃ pradadāti |
lokeśvaro jihvendriye sthitvā  trirasaṃ nirūpya  vajrajihvendriyaṃ pradadāti |
jānau ca dakṣiṇe cintayen  nīladaṇḍaṃ maho [ j ] jvalam |  vāme jānau mahābalaṃ
anābhogenaiva  trimukhaṣaḍbhujākāreṇa  kāyamaṇḍalād (26)  vinirggatya daśadigvighnagaṇā [ n ]  tarjayanti ||
kāyamaṇḍalavinyastadevatānāṃ  hetuñ ca phalam adhigato mantrī  parārthasaṃpattaye  kāyamaṇḍalād utsarggamṇḍalaṃ  nirmmiṇoty anena krameṇa |
atha vā bāhyāṅganām ādāya  dvayendriyasamāpattiṃ kṛtvā  bodhicittād (27)  [ yathaikavimānāddhaṃ ]
pūrvoktakrameṇa  kūṭāgāraṃ niṣpādya  vajradhṛg ityādimaṃtraṃ  samastadevatācakraṃ sṛjed iti |
bodhisattvāgramaṇḍala  iti |  rūpaśabdādibhir mantrī (25)  devatāṃ bhāvayet sade  ti ||
sa eva garbbha (29)  ādhyātmo yasya  sa kṣitigarbbhaḥ |
viśodhya  punar āgatya mahāvajradhareṇa  sahā [ ? ? ]  dvayībhūya
ākāśam anāvaraṇajñānam  sa eva garbbha ākāśagarbhaḥ |
nīvaraṇaṃ kleśaṃ  māyopamasamādhibalād  viṣkambhayati stambhayatīti  sarvanivaraṇaviṣkambhī |  apadadvipadacatuṣpadādisatveṣu
maitryālakṣanatvena  maitreyaḥ |  samantataś śobhano bhadras  samantabhadraḥ |
śabdyata iti śabdaḥ |  ghrāyata iti gandhaḥ | (30)  rasyata iti rasaḥ |  spṛśyata iti sparśaḥ |
evaṃ dvādaśākāra-  dharmacakrāc  caturmārān jayatīti  jinajik | (28)
sarvāsā ( sic ) -  paripūrakaṃ ratnaṃ  dhārayatīti  ratnadhṛk |
ro [ la ] iti saṃsāraḥ |  saṃsārāl lig gacchatīti  ārolik |
satvānāṃ traidhātuka [ ?? ]  niḥ ( sic )  krāntajñānapradānād  uṣṇīṣacakravartī |
ime devā dvātriṃśan  nirmmāṇakāyās trimukha-  ṣaḍbhujākārā  nānācihnamudrā- (32)  gṛhītāhastāḥ |  bodhicittān  mantraika nirmmāṇād  vā anābhogenaiva
puṇyasambhāra-  vṛddhyarthaṃ  rāgadveṣamohādi-  caritasatvānāṃ  tattatsamādhinā  kleśādyāvaraṇāni  viśodhya punar āgatya  svakasvakīyeṣv āsaneṣu niṣaṇṇā
uktāni cihnāni |  ta eva praharaṇākāreṇa dhāritāḥ |  śantipuṣṭyādikarmabhedāt  varṇṇabhedena  bhinnāḥ |
sa bhagavān  mahākrodhasamādhinā  teṣām antaṃ karotīti  vighnāntakṛt |  aṣṭalokācārān nityaṃ  pracalitahṛdayānāṃ
kim artham atra  trimukhākāreṇa saṃdṛśyata iti |
āha (36)  bhagavān eva kāraṇam āha |  sandhyāvyākaraṇa-  vyākhyātantre |  mahātatvam idaṃ tat
atha khalv akṣobhyas tathāgataḥ  sarvatathāgatakāyavākcitta-  yoṣidbhageṣu  virajaskaṃ mahāsamaya- (34)  maṇḍalam adhiṣṭhāpayāmāsa |
āha |  yady asmiṃs tantre  hastamudrā nāsti |  kathaṃ caturmudrāmudritaṃ  devatārūpaṃ niṣpadyate ||
ye satvās te ca buddhāḥ syus
tat kathaṃ sādhakānām  niḥsandeham bhavati | (40) āha
yathā kāyamaṇḍale  skandhādisvabhāvena  devatāvinyāso nāma ca |  tadvad  utsarggamaṇḍale cāpi  devatāvinyāsena bhavitavyaṃ |
tathāpi mūlasūtre  paripūrṇṇadevatāvinyāso nāsti |  kin tu nācāryakaṃ  pravarttanaṃ mābhūd iti |  maṇḍalavinyāsaś caikatra  paripūrṇṇo bhagavatā na (41)  pradarśitaḥ |
vyākhyātantre |  śrīvajramālāyāṃ  caikatra pradarśitaḥ |  tad avatāryate || ||
śṛṇu tvaṃ [ vai ] mahāsattva  nānyacittena saṃsmara |
triśaraṇas tritatvan tu  trikāyas trivimokṣakaḥ |  trimukhas tryakṣaraś caivam
sarvasandhi śarīrasya  samantabhadras tathāgataḥ | (44)  sarvasnāyuḥ śarīrasya
sumbharājas tathāgataḥ |  samaste caiva kāye'smin  sarva tathāgatāḥ sthitāḥ |
cittavajreṇa bhagavān  vijñānaskandha sthito [ ' ] py asau ||
tasmād vajraguroḥ kāye  jināḥ sarvve adhiṣṭhitāḥ
sarvabuddhabodhisattvān  sarvakleśaprahīṇān  daśabalavaiśāradyādi  buddhaguṇaprāptān  asmin prākṛtadehe  vinyased iti viruddhākhyāyikā
yathā patadgrahāvasthāyā [ ṃ ]  bhajanāvasthāyā [ ṃ ] loko  bhumkte |
prākṛtadeho rāga-  dveṣamohādayaś ca (48)  pūrvāvasthāyāṃ  saṃsārahetukāḥ  paścāt svabhāvaparijñāne  pariśuddhās  sarvajñajñāsiddhaye  hetukā bhavantīti na doṣaḥ |
ete sakalasambuddhāḥ  samāstā buddhakāyikāḥ |  praveśayanti nirvvāṇāṃ
evam eva kāśyapa kleśasaṃkāra-  buddhadharmā  virohantīti |  sandhyāvyākaraṇamahāyogatantre [ ' ] py āha | (49)
samayāt kṣared retaṃ vidhinā  pibet phalakāṃkṣayā |
tv asya nirdeśo vyākhyātaṃtre  sandhyāvyākaraṇani [ r ] diṣṭaḥ |
tathatāmaṇḍale yogī  sarvabuddhān praveśayed iti |  tasyāpi pratinirdeśaḥ |  vajramālāmahāyogataṃtre
jagadadvayayogena  so'vadat sandhāya śū ( sic ) kṣmakam || ||
rūpaskandhagatādarśo (51)  rūpaṃ ca paṃcamaṃ yāti  krodhamaitreyasaṃyutaṃ |
saṃskārāḥ kṛtyānuṣṭhānaṃ  māruto rasanendriyaṃ [ | ]  [ rasa ] ś ca pañcamaṃ yāti
rūpaskandhe prabhāśva ( sic ) raṃ  praviṣṭe sati lakṣaṇaṃ  lakṣayed budhaḥ |
sarvāṅgarūpāṇi  sthāmāni mlānāni mṛdūni mātrāṇi  śithilāni bhavanti |
nayanendriye gate  cakṣur vikāro bhavati |  saṃkṣubhati ca |
evam [ an ] ādisaṃsāre  apadadvipadacatuṣpadādi-  satvānāṃ vairocanakulīnāḥ  kāyamaṇḍale sthitvā
ye hy avayavasthitās teṣām  atra vyavasthā nāsti  tathāpy anukrameṇa  paramārthasatye  praviśanti |
samatājñāne līne (54)  triprakāraṃ mānasikavedanāṃ  na smārati |
śabdaviṣaye līne  svakāye śabdaṃ na śṛṇoti |
[ ca ] nirvāṇaṃ sarvaśūnyaṃ ca  dharmakāyo nigadyate | (52)
jihvendriye līne (56)  jihvā sthūlā hrasvā  nīlamūlā ca bhavati |
sa ca prāṇāyāmena sahaṃ  vajrajāpakrameṇa sthitvā
piṇḍagrahānuprabheda  [ nītva ] krameṇā-  nāhataṃ sākṣāt kṛtvā |
upasaṃhāraṃ karoti | tadā  oṃ śūnyatājñānavajra  svabhāvātmako'ham iti (57)
saṃ [ ? ]  jñāskandhe līne  dvipadādisatvānāṃ saṃjñā  na samarati |
mantrārthaḥ sākṣātkṛto bhavati āha  asya mantrasyārthaṃ nirdiśatu  bhagavān va [ va ] jraguruś śāstā |
śū ( sic )  kṣmayoge vyavasthitāḥ |  o [ ṃ ] m ity [ ādy ]
pratyavekṣaṇājñāne līne  mātṛputra-  bāndhavādīnāṃ  sarvasaṃjñāṃ jagati na smarati |
ghrāṇendriye līne  mandāśvasa  ūrdhvagatiś ca bhavati [ | ]
gandha [ viṣaye ] līne  [ visaviṣaya ] svakāye  gandhavisa ( sic )  yo na ghrāyate ||
tatra saṃskāraskandhe līne  sarvakāyakaraṇīyaṃ  na pravarttate |
viśvastāt siddhir uttamā ||  tattatpuruṣā [ pa ] yogena
api ca vajradhṛk kaścit  triśaṃ ( sic )  ketānvito naraḥ |
āvāhanaṃ visarjanaṃ syāt  tathā sthāpanam eva ca |
